name: DMQuick Random Names
description:
A spiritual successor to our original NPC Name Generator, this app includes new features and improvements that will help any DM spit out NPC names quickly and keep the game moving.

All the standard playable races are included, and you even have the option to generate names for dragons, orcs, giant-kin, and goblinoid characters.

Gender-specific buttons allow you to choose whether you need a name appropriate for a male or a female of the chosen race. Keep tapping the gender button until you get a name you like.

An improved name generation algorithm creates names (including surnames for playable races) that are more easily pronounceable.

If a generated name looks intimidating, you can tap it to hear your device say it out loud for you.

And, as a bonus, if you have a playable race selected, the app will spit out some random ideas you can use to describe the NPC to your players - things like age, hair styles, mannerisms, eye color, and clothing, just to name a few.
